content: when gaming on my popcorn my fingers get so cold but wearing gloves causes me to lose dexterity fingerless gloves work better but i hate the feel of the glove between my hand and the mouse for years i ve been thinking i wish i could have a glove with no palm that would work great i found a palmless mitt pattern from 1933 1 that i used as a base and added fingers i figured i couldn t be the only person in the whole wide world with this problem so i m sharing it with you may your fingers be warm and your attacks always do max damage **size** one size as written the glove is 4 from the top of the cuff to the base of the fingers and 3 5 across the knuckles these gloves fit my tiny baby hands but may not fit yours you can probably adjust the size by changing needle size adding or subtracting row in the hand section or even adjusting the number of cast on stitches the world is your oyster special thanks to rosberry crafts 2 for testing this pattern 1 https //www knitting-and com/crafts-and-needlework/knitting/patterns/mittens/palmless_mitts/ 2 https //www ravelry com/people/rosberrycrafts
